title: John Chiasson: An American Treasure
text:
John Chiasson: An American Treasure
































Produced several ECE and MBE MS and PhDs.
They landed high tech jobs at robotics, ML.

title: John Chiasson: An American Treasure
text:
Early Academy Years: Fourishing Academician



B.S. in Mathematics from the University of Arizona
M.S. in Electrical Engineering from Washington State University
Ph.D. in Control Sciences from the University of Minnesota

title: John Chiasson: An American Treasure
text:
John’s Academic Legacy







John had an h-index of 52!
John was top 1% scientist worldwide, identified by Stanford University in 2021! [source]
His self-citation rate was 2.94%!
His book Modeling and high performance control of electric machines was the only book I could learn this subject from - truly a masterpiece!

It has 803 citations so far.

He was a rigorous author: produced three more books of incredible depth and precision!



Download PDF file.
